name: Best Tapenade Ever
author: Pam R
summary: This recipe is wonderful served with a sliced baguette or plain crackers. It can also be mixed together with cream cheese and/or sour cream for a great vegetable dip, or tossed with pasta, potatoes or rice. Whenever I make this appetizer, I always get lots of requests for the recipe!
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, undrained
2  hot banana peppers, seeded and cut into pieces
1  red bell pepper, seeded and coarsely chopped
directions: In a food processor or blender, chop green olives, black olives, and artichoke hearts in batches until just spreadable; pour into a mixing bowl
Puree banana peppers and red bell pepper until just spreadable; mix into olive mixture
Stir in garlic, capers, basil, lemon juice, and olive oil until well blended
Tapenade will keep in refrigerator for up to 1 week
